code: import React from'react';import{Menu,Avatar}from'antd';import{getAllStockSymbols,getStockData}from'../data/stocksData';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StockNavigation=_ref=>{let{selectedStock,onStockChange,collapsed}=_ref;const stockSymbols=getAllStockSymbols();const stocks=stockSymbols.map(symbol=>{const stockData=getStockData(symbol);if(!stockData)return null;return{key:symbol,label:collapsed?symbol:stockData.name,icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{size:"small",style:{backgroundColor:stockData.avatar.backgroundColor},children:stockData.avatar.text}),description:stockData.subsector};}).filter(Boolean);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'16px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{fontSize:'14px',color:'#666',marginBottom:'8px',textAlign:collapsed?'center':'left'},children:collapsed?'股票':'选择股票'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu,{mode:"inline",selectedKeys:[selectedStock],style:{borderRight:0},items:stocks.map(stock=>({key:stock.key,icon:stock.icon,label:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{width:'100%',overflow:'hidden',textOverflow:'ellipsis'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{fontWeight:'bold',fontSize:'14px',lineHeight:'1.4',marginBottom:'2px',overflow:'hidden',textOverflow:'ellipsis',whiteSpace:'nowrap'},children:stock.label}),!collapsed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{fontSize:'11px',color:'#999',lineHeight:'1.3',overflow:'hidden',textOverflow:'ellipsis',whiteSpace:'nowrap'},children:stock.description})]}),onClick:()=>onStockChange(stock.key)}))})]});};export default StockNavigation;
